articles.title: Man in Brazil dies after jumping into piranha-infested lake to escape swarm of bees - AsiaOne
articles.description: A man in Brazil reportedly died after jumping into a lake to escape a swarm of bees, only to be partially devoured by flesh-eating piranhas. His mangled body was found last Sunday (Oct 31), although it was initially unclear if he had died by drowning before b…
articles.content:
A man in Brazil reportedly died after jumping into a lake to escape a swarm of bees, only to be partially devoured by flesh-eating piranhas.

articles.title: Sabre-toothed cats cared for each other when injured, fossil evidence suggests - CBC.ca
articles.description: Researchers identified bone damage suggesting a cat lived a long life with hip dysplasia, which means it likely only could have survived with help from other animals.
articles.content: Scientists have found that the fossilized remains of an adult sabre-toothed cat show signs that it lived with a congenital hip condition, suggesting that it lived in a social group with other cats wh… [+4474 chars]
